query.oql: select p from patients p where p.gender = "male" and p.country = "Switzerland"
query.qrawl: select p from patients p where p.gender = "male" and p.country = "Switzerland"

query.oql: select p.patient_id, p.surname, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis from patients p
query.qrawl: select p.patient_id, p.surname, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis from patients p

query.oql: select p.name, p.surname, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis, (select i.name from p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i ) as forms from patients p where p.surname = "Thomas"
query.qrawl: select p.name, p.surname, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis, (select i.name from p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i ) as forms from patients p where p.surname = "Thomas"

query.oql: select gender, city, (select d from partition) as diagnosis from ( select p.gender, p.city, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis from patients p where p.country = "Portugal" ) T, T.diagnosis d group by gender: T.gender, city: T.city
query.qrawl: select gender, city, (select d from partition) as diagnosis from ( select p.gender, p.city, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis from patients p where p.country = "Portugal" ) T, T.diagnosis d group by gender: T.gender, city: T.city
query.result: [ { "gender": "female", "diagnosis": [ "Folliculitis ulerythematosa reticulata", "Rheumatoid arthritis with involvement of other organs and systems", "Telogen effluvium", "Lichen sclerosus et atrophicus" ], "city": "Guimaraes" }, { "gender": "female", "diagnosis": [ "Hidradenitis suppurativa", "Hypertrophic lichen planus" ], "city": "Lisbon" }, { "gender": "female", "diagnosis": [ "Yellow nail syndrome", "Lichen planopilaris", "Pyoderma gangrenosum", "Acne tropica", "Other specified follicular disorders", "Acanthosis nigricans", "Rhinophyma", "Atrophoderma of Pasini and Pierini", "Miliaria crystallina", "Acrodermatitis chronica atrophicans", "Acquired ichthyosis", "Coeliac disease", "Allergic urticaria", "Decubitus ulcer and pressure area, unspecified", "Hypertrophic lichen planus", "Other pruritus" ], "city": "Oporto" }, { "gender": "male", "diagnosis": [ "Other pemphigus", "Acute radiodermatitis", "Juvenile ankylosing spondylitis", "Diaper [napkin] dermatitis", "Other sunburn", "Lymphomatoid papulosis", "Discoid lupus erythematosus", "Contracture of joint", "Other psoriasis", "Arthropathic psoriasis", "Erythema nodosum", "Exfoliative dermatitis", "Dermatitis herpetiformis", "Pruritus ani", "Lymphomatoid papulosis", "Cellulitis of face", "Other alopecia areata", "Erythema marginatum in acute rheumatic fever" ], "city": "Guimaraes" }, { "gender": "male", "diagnosis": [ "Toxic erythema", "Photocontact dermatitis [berloque dermatitis]", "Disease of digestive system, unspecified", "Other specified papulosquamous disorders", "Acne excoriee des jeunes filles", "Calculus of gallbladder without cholecystitis", "Other peritonitis" ], "city": "Lisbon" }, { "gender": "male", "diagnosis": [ "Alopecia universalis", "Cellulitis of other sites" ], "city": "Oporto" } ]

query.oql: select gender, (select d from partition) as diagnosis, (select f from partition) as forms from (select p.gender, p.city, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis, (select i.name from p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i ) as forms from patients p where p.city = "Oporto" ) T, T.diagnosis d, T.forms f group by gender: T.gender, city: T.city
query.qrawl: select gender, (select d from partition) as diagnosis, (select f from partition) as forms from (select p.gender, p.city, (select d.description from p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d) as diagnosis, (select i.name from p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i ) as forms from patients p where p.city = "Oporto" ) T, T.diagnosis d, T.forms f group by gender: T.gender, city: T.city
query.result: [ { "forms": [ "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Desmodesmus infection", "Sepsis", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Desmodesmus infection", "Sepsis", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Desmodesmus infection", "Sepsis", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Desmodesmus infection", "Sepsis", "Monkeypox", "Monkeypox", "Monkeypox", "Monkeypox", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Dilantin", "Trichinosis", "Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (CJD)", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Dilantin", "Trichinosis", "Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease (CJD)", "Enterococcus infection", "Enterococcus infection", "Enterococcus infection", "Enterococcus infection" ], "gender": "female", "diagnosis": [ "Yellow nail syndrome", "Yellow nail syndrome", "Yellow nail syndrome", "Lichen planopilaris", "Lichen planopilaris", "Lichen planopilaris", "Pyoderma gangrenosum", "Pyoderma gangrenosum", "Pyoderma gangrenosum", "Acne tropica", "Acne tropica", "Acne tropica", "Rhinophyma", "Atrophoderma of Pasini and Pierini", "Miliaria crystallina", "Acrodermatitis chronica atrophicans", "Acquired ichthyosis", "Acquired ichthyosis", "Acquired ichthyosis", "Acquired ichthyosis", "Coeliac disease", "Coeliac disease", "Coeliac disease", "Coeliac disease", "Allergic urticaria", "Decubitus ulcer and pressure area, unspecified", "Hypertrophic lichen planus", "Other pruritus" ] }, { "forms": [ "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Non-steroidal anti-inflammatories", "Anaplasmosis", "Schistosomiasis", "ALLERGIES_COMMENT", "Non-steroidal anti-inflammatories", "Anaplasmosis", "Schistosomiasis" ], "gender": "male", "diagnosis": [ "Alopecia universalis", "Alopecia universalis", "Alopecia universalis", "Alopecia universalis", "Cellulitis of other sites", "Cellulitis of other sites", "Cellulitis of other sites", "Cellulitis of other sites" ] } ]

query.oql: select category, city, count(partition) from patients p, p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d group by city: p.city, category: d.category
query.qrawl: select category, city, count(partition) from patients p, p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d group by city: p.city, category: d.category

query.oql: select p.gender as gender, p.city as city, p.country as country, count(p.chartBasedData.medication) as med from patients p
query.qrawl: select p.gender as gender, p.city as city, p.country as country, count(p.chartBasedData.medication) as med from patients p

query.oql: select T.p.surname, min(T.d) as m, max(T.d) as M, avg(T.d) as a from ( select p, (select r.totalMinutes from p.chartBasedData.nursingReports r) as d from patients p where p.country = "Italy" ) T order by max(T.d)
query.qrawl: select T.p.surname, min(T.d) as m, max(T.d) as M, avg(T.d) as a from ( select p, (select r.totalMinutes from p.chartBasedData.nursingReports r) as d from patients p where p.country = "Italy" ) T order by max(T.d)

query.oql: select p.birthDate, count(p.patientBasedData.diagnosis) as n_diag, sum(select r.nurseCount from p.chartBasedData.nursingReports r) as nurses from patients p where p.country = "Italy" order by p.birthDate
query.qrawl: select p.birthDate, count(p.patientBasedData.diagnosis) as n_diag, sum(select r.nurseCount from p.chartBasedData.nursingReports r) as nurses from patients p where p.country = "Italy" order by p.birthDate

query.oql: select name, count(partition) as N from patients p, p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items item where f.formType = "ALLERGIES_FORM" and item.name != "ALLERGIES_COMMENT" -- ignore that value group by name: item.name
query.qrawl: select name, count(partition) as N from patients p, p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items item where f.formType = "ALLERGIES_FORM" and item.name != "ALLERGIES_COMMENT" -- ignore that value group by name: item.name

query.oql: struct( a: "hello", b: 20, chart: struct( dummy : 5, alergies: select name, count(partition) as N from patients p, p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i where f.formType = "ALLERGIES_FORM" group by name: i.name), d: "test", diagnosis : (select d.sub_category, d.category from patients p, p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d))
query.qrawl: struct( a: "hello", b: 20, chart: struct( dummy : 5, alergies: select name, count(partition) as N from patients p, p.patientBasedData.formData f, f.items i where f.formType = "ALLERGIES_FORM" group by name: i.name), d: "test", diagnosis : (select d.sub_category, d.category from patients p, p.patientBasedData.diagnosis d))
